::blacknightmare/Mantys/Wespa/ 5 bat probes::

"just wait me a nanoclick..."said blacknightmare and commanded at her 
subordintes" wespa, mantys... i like that the body of this... junk 
destroyed in few cycles " she said while she took bat-probe remains 
and added sawing at them "just keep me his head" nd she told at bt 
probes "three of you keep an eye... i don't like other inmterruption"


trhee bt-probes flew arround gurding the base and blacknightmare and 
the two of bat probes followed at darkmouse and told her "i expect 
don't care that that my subordintares clean the mess that our amusing 
fight made... by the way, may i clean my metalls before see at your 
commander ???"





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> DarkMouse::
> 
> She walked closer tot he body and kicked it lightly with her 
> foot."Well, that's the last we'll see of that turkey." she said 
with 
> a chuckle. She looked up at Black Nightmare. "Your the one who came 
> to talk to KitKat aren't you. Well, let's get you and your team 
> inside and patched up. Then you can talk to KitKat."
> She fired one more blast at the turkey body, just to make sure. 
Then 
> walked over to the ramp and went inside.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Bounty tried to dodge the feather with bad results, though it 
> missed his
> > spark it still went through his shoulder pinning him to the 
> wall. "Release
> > me at once or suffer charges of intent." The four fireing at him 
> seemed
> > unimpressed. Without mobility his Temporal displacer was useless. 
> The
> > autoguns locked on, the Bat probes pummeled him, Blacknightmare, 
> Mantys,
> > Wespa, and Darkmouse all had an open shot. The blasters bounced 
off 
> his body
> > until his resistance to damage wore thin. The first blast 
> penetrated his
> > left arm, then one shot through the shoulder with the blade 
ripping 
> his arm
> > off. "AAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHH" Bounty yelled until a blast severed his 
> neck
> > causing his head to fall to the ground. Eventually the attackers 
> stopped
> > firing and the hole filled body fell to the ground nonfunctional. 
> His spark
> > hovered out of his body and fell to the ground extinguishing 
> itself. A last
> > flinch of neural discharge caused the body to jump one last time 
> before
> > laying still forever.
> > 
> > 
> > With it's pilot destroyed the Ship he arrived in disapeared back 
to 
> whatever
> > time it had come from leaving no evidence that it had existed in 
> the first
> > place.
> > 
> >
